Class QuicClientCodecBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.netty.handler.codec.quic.QuicCodecBuilder<QuicClientCodecBuilder>
io.netty.handler.codec.quic.QuicClientCodecBuilder
public final class QuicClientCodecBuilder extends QuicCodecBuilder<QuicClientCodecBuilder>
QuicCodecBuilder that configures and builds a ChannelHandler that should be added to the ChannelPipeline of a QUIC client.
